statement: Successful people know how to say no.
question: Do successful people know how to say no?
negation: Successful people don't know how to say no.

statement: Saying no is a way to take care of ourselves and accomplish our goals.
question: Is saying no a way to take care of ourselves and accomplish our goals.?
negation: Saying no is not a way to take care of ourselves and accomplish our goals.

statement: I will respect that and adjust my plan.
question: Will I respect that and adjust my plan?
negation: I won't respect that and adjust my plan.
